articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Contributors to Successful Satellite Launch
						
 Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent gifts to scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2.
					 Kim Jong Un invited them to Pyongyang and showed them the biggest privileges and warm benevolence to remember all their life.
					
					 A ceremony for conveying the gifts took place here on Monday.
